title: U.S. household expenditure on soaps and detergents 2007 to 2018
yAxis: Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars
summary: This statistic shows the average annual expenditure on cleansing and toilet tissue , paper towels and napkins per consumer unit in the united from 2007 to 2018 . In 2018 , the country 's average expenditure on cleansing and toilet tissue , paper towels and napkins amounted to 119.8 u.s. dollars per consumer unit .
gold: This statistic shows the average annual expenditure on soaps and detergents per consumer unit in the United States from 2007 to 2018 . In 2018 , the country 's average expenditure on soaps and detergents amounted to 92.05 U.S. dollars per consumer unit .
